attributes.title: Would not recommend
attributes.review: Who else love our Cheeto puff as “president” I wanted to support so I got this app but it sadly didn’t work and would not recommend it probably has a virus.

attributes.title: ew
attributes.review: I just honestly think Donald trump is a baddie🦋but without the bad :) oh and also he deserves a chair so he can relaxe from all the stuff he needs to do but just make the chair electric. k that’s it lemme Delete this dumb app now Obama2020

attributes.title: Crash & burn
attributes.review: Make this make sense. I can’t believe that this app is in existence. It crashes repeatedly. I can’t open it and I spent all afternoon trying to make it work. I hate it here.

attributes.title: Make America Great :)
attributes.review: Just wanted to come on here and express my disappointment in our beloved orange Cheeto of a president. I keep praying his sins away but I fear his ignorance and bigotry can’t be saved 🤧. Break a leg in the upcoming election! No seriously break it 🌸💐😘🧚🏼

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Absolutely horrible app. It didn’t even load I waited hours and still hasn’t.🤮 just throw the whole all away please remove it

attributes.title: COMPLETE TRASH
attributes.review: when i got on the app all kinds of glitches showed up and i saw very inappropriate images this app needs to be taken off the app store what if kids see this😡😡😡😡

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This is by far the worst app. Every time it opens it closes and freezes my phone. Smh though trump could drop a small loan of 1 million dollars into to this to make it good.

attributes.title: This app ruined my phone
attributes.review: This app is COMPLETE TRASH it took up way too much storage in my phone and phone after downloading the app continued to crash whether I was on the app or not

attributes.title: very glitchy and no good things planned
attributes.review: I was really hoping this would show what is going through his mind when saying things but no he’s just helpless
